column1: 要执行清理操作的材质
column2: The material to perform cleanup operations on

column1: 用于查找名称中包含该字符串的对象
column2: Used for finding objects that include this in their name

column1: 切换是否只在活动场景中搜索
column2: Toggles whether to only search in the active scene

column1: 切换在比较名称时是否考虑大小写
column2: Toggles whether to consider case when comparing names
Different types of object to select

column1: 作为前缀或后缀添加的标记
column2: Tag to be added as a prefix or suffix

column1: 用于前缀和后缀的分隔符
column2: Delimiter to use for prefixes and suffixes

column1: 顶点数，用于比较选择对象
column2: Vertex count for comparing objects to choose selection
Mode to compare the vertex count

column1: 为全局所有灯光添加的数值
column2: Value to add to all lights globally
Value to multiply light sources by
The mode for modifying light strength

column1: 材料名称中必须包含的字符串
column2: A string that must be included in a material name

column1: 节点名称中必须包含的字符串
column2: A string that must be included in a node name

column1: 只更改选定灯光对象的颜色
column2: Only change color of selected light objects

column1: 快速分解选定对象的速率
column2: The rate to quickly decimate selected object

column1: 将大纲器分为不同类别
删除所有不需要的数据
帮我清理混合文件，好吗？
column2: Just clean the blend file me, will ya?

column1: 设置自动平滑为真并给出角度
column2: Sets auto smooth true and gives angle

column1: 获取选中的点，并以此将对象移至世界原点
column2: Takes the selected point and uses this to shift the object to the world origin

column1: 删除选定对象中未使用的材料槽
column2: Removes unused material slots from selected object

column1: 删除重复的节点组并替换为原始节点组
column2: Removes duplicate node groups and replaced with original

column1: 将当前值设置为选定节点组的默认值
column2: Sets the current values to be the default values for selected node groups

column1: 获取当前值作为选定节点组的默认值
column2: Gets the current values to be the default values for selected node groups

column1: 选择包括 ht_tools.select_type 在内的所有对象
将找到的对象组成一个集合
column2: Form a collection with the found objects

column1: 选择 ht_tools.select_string 的所有对象
将找到的某个类型的对象组成一个集合
column2: Form a collection with the found objects of a type

column1: 添加标签字符串作为前缀
column2: Adds the tag string as a prefix

column1: 添加标签字符串作为后缀
column2: Adds the tag string as a suffix

column1: 通过比较给定的顶点数来选择对象
column2: Selects objects by comparing given vertex count

column1: 根据顶点计数将找到的对象组成一个集合
column2: Form a collection with the found objects depending on vertex count

column1: 为场景中的所有灯光增加强度
column2: Adds intensity to all lights in the scene

column1: 减去场景中所有灯光的强度
column2: Subtracts intensity to all lights in the scene

column1: 将场景中所有灯光的强度相乘
column2: Multiplies intensity of all lights in the scene

column1: 将选定灯光的颜色设置为 RGB 属性
column2: Sets the color of selected lights to the RGB property

column1: 随机化所选灯光对象的灯光颜色
column2: Randomizes the light color for selected light objects

column1: 根据 ht_tool.decimate_rate 快速分解对象
column2: Quickly decimates object based on ht_tool.decimate_rate

column1: 切换世界节点中的体积着色器
column2: Toggles volume shaders in the world nodes
